name: Saara Hopea-Untracht
biography: Interior designer, furniture, jewelry, glass, textile designer, ceramicist. 1946-8 furniture designer for Mobilia. 1948-52 lighting designer for Taito. Designed for Nuutajärvi. Later assistant to Kaj Franck. 1960s worked in silver jewelry and enameling. Became artistic direction at family firm, Ossian Hopea, in Porvoo, Finland.
